meta.description: Determine the optimal production plan to maximize profit for a factory producing three products using different equipment for two procedures.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: The products produced by the factory.

params.name: processing_time_A
params.description: Processing time for each product on equipment A.

params.name: processing_time_B
params.description: Processing time for each product on equipment B.

params.name: available_time_A
params.description: Available operating time for equipment A.

params.name: available_time_B
params.description: Available operating time for equipment B.

params.name: equipment_cost_A
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for equipment A.

params.name: equipment_cost_B
params.description: Equipment cost at full load for equipment B.

params.name: raw_material_cost
params.description: Raw material cost per unit for each product.

params.name: unit_price
params.description: Selling price per unit for each product.

vars.name: x_A
vars.description: Number of units of each product processed on equipment A.

vars.name: x_B
vars.description: Number of units of each product processed on equipment B.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((unit_price[p] - raw_material_cost[p]) * (sum(x_A[e][p] for e in EQUIPMENT_A if processing_time_A[e][p] is not None) + sum(x_B[e][p] for e in EQUIPMENT_B if processing_time_B[e][p] is not None)) - sum(equipment_cost_A[e] for e in EQUIPMENT_A) - sum(equipment_cost_B[e] for e in EQUIPMENT_B) for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize the profit from selling products after accounting for raw material and equipment costs.

constraints.name: time_constraint_A1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_A['A1'][p] * x_A['A1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_A['A1'][p] is not None)
constraints.description: Ensure equipment A1 does not exceed available operating time.

constraints.name: time_constraint_A2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_A['A2'][p] * x_A['A2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_A['A2'][p] is not None)
constraints.description: Ensure equipment A2 does not exceed available operating time.

constraints.name: time_constraint_B1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B1'][p] * x_B['B1'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B1'][p] is not None)
constraints.description: Ensure equipment B1 does not exceed available operating time.

constraints.name: time_constraint_B2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B2'][p] * x_B['B2'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B2'][p] is not None)
constraints.description: Ensure equipment B2 does not exceed available operating time.

constraints.name: time_constraint_B3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(processing_time_B['B3'][p] * x_B['B3'][p] for p in PRODUCTS if processing_time_B['B3'][p] is not None)
constraints.description: Ensure equipment B3 does not exceed available operating time.
